content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; currently out of fuel with its furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with fuel (2 units of coal) and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status NO_POWER, research set to automation and electrical_id updated to 8472.
- ElectricityGroup with id=8472 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; final status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings: [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) producing steam; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel”, fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water at 15°, and connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water; status WORKING with connection point at (-9.5, 23.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31068 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31069 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31070 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31075 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31074 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31079 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31078 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=31081 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Fluid System Identifier Mismatch:
  - Multiple connection attempts to the steam engine using fluid_system identifiers [30724, 30767, 30810, 30853, 30896, 30939, 30982, 31025] resulted in “No working PipeGroup found” errors. Verify the active fluid_system value from a working PipeGroup before initiating a connection.

• Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Repeated fixed waiting periods of 10 seconds for pipeline stabilization introduce unnecessary delays. Replace static delays with dynamic connectivity checks to proceed as soon as the network is ready.
